title: Fizz or Buzz application using JavaScript, CSS, and HTML.
text: Fizz Buzz Chcker ,to see if your number is divisble by 2, 3, or 15; whcih will return 'Fizz', 'Buzz', or 'Fizz Buzz'.

bullets.Simple: Extremely simple to use - so simple that it almost feels like magic!
bullets.Powerful: Select any number, psoive values only!
